LSPosed Module Repository

This repository syncs with [LSPosed Modules Repository](https://modules.lsposed.org/). Apps in this repository are official binaries built by the original application developers and released on the official github pages.

Currently it serves 468 apps. To add it to your F-Droid app, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this link:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cesaryuan/LSPosed-Modules-F-Droid/main/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
D7 5D 70 9F BC 3A 39 8D 18 6C 84 9D 5E F3 27 C6 32 17 8F B7 36 8E 1C 7F 42 C9 DD 19 25 8B FA E4
